casebody.data:
William Charles RICHARDSON, Appellant(s)/Petitioner(s),
v.
The STATE of Florida, et al., Appellee(s)/Respondent(s), CASE NO.: 3D17-2051 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. OCTOBER 30, 2017 EMAS, LOGUE and LINDSEY, JJ., concur.

Following review of the petition for writ of mandamus and the response thereto, it is ordered that said petition is hereby denied.
